K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-015:401b-1: a'arya bighan bi n'a ya k'a da tra dh'a ra ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-015:401b-4: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na; bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-015:401b-5: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-015:401b-7: tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po 'dzin pa des cho ga thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-015:401b-8: dgongs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-015:401b-9: gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-015:401b-18: ru ru tsa tsa ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-015:401b-19: aa bhu tr'a bi na du: kham manytse ddh'a ba ra sa gtstsha ti ha ha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-015:401b-26: nang par langs te sngags lan bdun bzlas la chu khyor ba gang steng dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-015:401b-27: 'og gi phyogs su gtor cig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-015:401b-29: gsang sngags sgrub par 'dod pas skud pa dkar po la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor te lag pa la bcings na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-015:402a-2: bgegs thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-015:402a-3: gang na tshogs kyi bdag po snang ba der sngags 'di lan gcig bklags na yang bgegs rnams bar chad mi byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-015:402a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'khor de dag thams cad dga' ste lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-015:402a-7: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-015:402a-8: 'phags pa bgegs sel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-015:402a-10: pha wam gi rtug pa kun la bsku ba'i rtug pa sbyar ba'i du bas bdugs na 'go ba'i nad pa'i gan du phyin yang mi tshugs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-015:402a-11: gos pa la thug na myur du sel /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-015:402a-12: khyim du 'byung po gnod pa dag la rab tu bsngags so ////
